short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Split it fair: Hassle-free bill splitting, every time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you the friend who always gets stuck with the bill? Splitter can help! 
This handy app takes the guesswork out of splitting bills with friends. 
Just enter the bill total, number of people, optionally add a tip, and Splitter will handle the calculations. 
No more mental gymnastics or awkward conversations, Splitter keeps things fun and fair!
